text: @DeborahMeaden When is the MSM going to start holding the government's handling of the Covid-19 epidemic up to scrutiny. At the moment the are behaving like they are the LOTO and telling Boris he's doing a marvellous job in the circumstances; when nothing could be further from the truth..
